Class Auth.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.amplify.auth.Auth.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Auth

    public static class Auth.Builder
extends Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Auth.Builder awsConfiguration(AWSConfiguration awsConfiguration)
      Developer provides the AWSConfiguration object that represents the awsconfiguration.json file.
      Auth build()
      Build the Auth object based on the input passed through the Auth.Builder object
      Auth.Builder clientConfiguration(ClientConfiguration clientConfiguration)
      Developer provides the ClientConfiguration object.
      Auth.Builder cognitoIdentityPool(String poolID, Regions region, boolean enablingCaching)
      Developer provides the Cognito Identity PoolID, region and the option to enable caching of AWSCredentials and IdentityID in order to construct the CognitoCredentialsProvider or CognitoCachingCredentialsProvider.
      Auth.Builder context(Context context)
      Developer provides the context to be used to construct the SignInProvider and CredentialsProvider
      Auth.Builder credentialsProvider(AWSCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
      Developer provides implementation of credential plugin for use
      Auth.Builder plugin(SignInProviderBuilder signInProviderBuilder)
      Developer provides the input required to construct the SignInProvider through the SignInProviderBuilder.

      • credentialsProvider

        public Auth.Builder credentialsProvider(AWSCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
        Developer provides implementation of credential plugin for use
        Parameters:
        credentialsProvider - instance of STSSessionCredentialsProvider, CognitoCredentialsProvider, StaticCredentialsProvider
        Returns:
        builder

      • cognitoIdentityPool

        public Auth.Builder cognitoIdentityPool(String poolID,
                                        Regions region,
                                        boolean enablingCaching)
        Developer provides the Cognito Identity PoolID, region and the option to enable caching of AWSCredentials and IdentityID in order to construct the CognitoCredentialsProvider or CognitoCachingCredentialsProvider.
        Parameters:
        poolID - the Cognito Identity Pool Id
        region - the Cognito Identity Region
        enablingCaching - if true create CognitoCachingCredentialsProvider, else create CognitoCredentialsProvider.
        Returns:
        builder

        Returns:

        Returns:
        builder

        public Auth build()
        Build the Auth object based on the input passed through the Auth.Builder object
        Returns:
        the built Auth object
